column4: can someone give me a valid argument as to why there isn't a binary available?
the original server went offline
and the IDIOTS are not awake to put it online
and I already moved the dns
and the sql file was delted because
and this is IMPORTANT
So, HOW IS IT POSSIBLE that when I get this new server they have a root account setup. karmic doesn't install that way does it?
I didn't even notice, I ran some scripts
and then was like, ffs, what? I need to setup this, and groups. ok.
extundelete
We don't do Mac OSX support.
and realise I'd copied the sql file also into the ... jpds - yes I am on OSX. thanks for noticing. My server, and the file, are on karmic
and I don't want to hear about you not supporting OSX, if that is the only reason you wanted to talk to me, thanks
Some people - feel so empowered, see a point in which they can say something negative, and off they go, loaded question in hand, ready to pounce. Internet heros.
I'm ok. Just... every time 1 thing goes wrong I get exposed to 47 things that make me wonder how humanity ever managed to walk upright. :p
I thought you were trying to install extundelete on the OSX, sorry.
no worries, I needed something else to deal with and explain. I am just... curious. If there exists at all, in any universe, a reason for not having a binary...
just... curious
Because noone has packaged it?
right. its just. ugh.
https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+bug/510603
